item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation # Pizza is compatible with all major operating systems. The package is compiled statically, and it does not require any external dependencies. Automatic installation # Use the following command to automatically download the latest version of INFINI Pizza for your platform and extract it into /opt/pizza: curl -sSL http://get.infini.cloud | bash -s -- -p pizza The optional parameters for the script are as follows: -v <version number> (default is the latest version) -d <installation directory> (default is /opt/pizza) Manual installation # Visit the URL below to download the package for your operating system:
